title: [Name Pending]
description: [Name Pending] is a 3D platformer. Players face off against their friends, fighting to be the last man standing. Online multiplayer and CPU battles coming soon.

title: Dreadnaught
description: WELCOME ABOARD, ADMIRAL. Few have the technical skill needed to command the DSS Dreadnought. Fewer still have the iron resolve needed to face such overwhelming odds. Our forward screening fleet has been scattered by enemy forces and is under attack. The enemy is using advanced signal jammers to disrupt comms and move undetected. Worse still, our supplies are limited, so you must be both efficient and effective with your equipment usage. We’ve approved use of our recon facilities, as well as our turrets if need be. Remember, information is our greatest weapon. But be warned, the battlefield can be unpredictable, and a radiation storm looms over the horizon… We know the stakes are personal for you, Admiral. Make your motherland proud. Dobrichnostan salutes you.

title: Witch, Wash, Wepeat
description: Use powerful spells and daring parkour to navigate the puzzling manor and gather laundry as quickly as possible in single-player or co-op.

title: Voice Controlled Wheelchair
description: The voice controlled wheelchair aims to give people with more severe mobility issues, greater freedom in their day to day life.

title: Arachn0id
description: Arachn0id is a third person survival shooter, made in Unreal Engine. The player acts as a spider, attempting to break free of the military compound it's held prisoner at. The player must navigate through levels, defeat enemies, and fight bosses, all while managing their heat bar.

title: Touched
description: Don't get touched. Keep your player away from the various enemies by clicking and dragging. Some enemies can be destroyed by hovering over them and pressing space bar. Be careful though cause you may stun yourself if you miss.

title: GenZMode
description: GenZMode makes navigating your banking app easy and efficient. Send money, and add various contacts with the press of a button

title: Kitchen Frenzy
description: This game was my introduction to Unity. I learned how base functions work, got used to scripting and much more. In the game, the player must create dishes to satisfy customer orders. Original tutorial is linked in the video description.

title: Gravity Guy
description: My first solo game in Unity! Based off one of my favourite childhood games, Gravity Guy. Credits to its creators for the inspiration
